tool_description: This is an API of the last soccer FIFA world cups from the start in 1930 until the last FIFA world cup in Russia, you will find useful information like winners, individual awards ... etc
title: World Cup

api_list.name: Best Young Player
api_list.description: Returns the winners of the best young player in the competition.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cup1.p.rapidapi.com/best_young_player"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cup1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: World Cup Detail by Year
api_list.description: Returns the world cup details in a specific year.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://world-cup1.p.rapidapi.com/worldcups/{year}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "world-cup1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Winners
api_list.description: Returns all the winners of the world cup including the second,third and the fourth place.
